strIntroduction: Explore the UNESCO World Heritage, the Budapest panorama, and visit the beautiful sites along Danube River while enjoying the delicate buffet lunch on the cruise.

Soak up the sunshine and gentle breezes as the boat lazily cuts through peaceful waters heading to an almost forgotten world. Join this day long trip and discover the delights of the Elaphite Islands, an oasis in the Adriatic.
To enjoy a romantic tasteful dinner on the cruise ship while sailing under the sunset and a starlit sky.
Dubrovnik indeed provides ideal natural settings for King’s Landing. By strolling around in the city, you can recognize locations that you've seen in the series!

Located less than one hour from the city of Dubrovnik, the Montenegro coast offers incomparable natural beauty and a great variety of historical places. Take a tour to discover a whole new culture and landscape, just a quick trip from the Croatian coast.

Head out from Copenhagen on a luxury mini-van tour to discover the city of Malmö. Explore Stora Torget and Lilla Torget, the city’s main squares. Cross the Øresund Bridge into Sweden and experience 2 countries in a single day.

Visit Nuuksio National Park, one of Finland’s top nature attractions, and enjoy a trek led by a professional biologist.

strIntroduction: The island of the sea turtle with its long beaches, idyllic bays, its magnificent blooming Flora and romantic grottos counts as the loveliest island in the Ionian sea. With pine trees, cypress, vineyards and the Italian architecture, this island reminds of Tuscany.

This is a real once in a lifetime experience. Getting married at one of the most beautiful places on earth under the spirit of the sacred Santorini as the sun falls slept in one of the most amazing sunsets in the world. You don't have to worry about anything; all arrangements are done from us. All you have to consider is to be fresh, happy and enjoy this incredible day of your life.

Relax, breathe and flow into the island’s sacred and revitalizing energy. Sunset Vinyasa will give the yoga lover an opportunity to experience their practice from the most unique vantage point Mykonos has to offer.

Choose our basic wedding package, including all that you need on your special day. The day begins seamlessly. Once all the necessary preparations are made at the hotel, you are picked up and transferred to the striking Castle Panigirakis, a landmark location overlooking the incredible Aegean Sea and Mykonos Town, which the energy of the island of Delos ahead of the horizon.

Take a half-day tour of Cape Sounion and the Temple of Poseidon. Pass idyllic beaches as you leave Athens for some of the most gorgeous ruins of Ancient Greece. Your fun guide will fill you in on the history of Greece as you look out over Poseidon's sea!
strTitle: Temple of Poseidon and Cape Sounion Tour: From Athens

strIntroduction: Experience a fascinating and poignant day as you sail to the beautiful island of Spinalonga, often called the “island of tears” due to its past as a leper colony. For over fifty years it was home to hundreds of lepers who were forbidden to leave yet attempted to live normal lives. Explore the shops, hospital and graveyard before sailing to Kolokitha Island to moor at an idyllic beach. Relax, swim or snorkel whilst the crew prepares a delicious barbecue lunch and drinks.
strTitle: Sailing excursion to Spinalonga and Kolokitha Islands

strIntroduction: Take a guided morning hike in Meteora to see the best views of the area's 6 Eastern Orthodox monasteries made of sandstone rock. On this 5-hour tour, enjoy fresh air and marvel at the jaw-dropping panoramic views from this UNESCO World Heritage Site.
strTitle: From Kalampaka: 5-Hour Hiking Tour of Meteora
Hydra, Poros and Egina Day Cruise from Athens

strIntroduction: The amazing crystal visibility of the Mediterranean waters will allow divers to see sponges, corals, lumper eels, blackfish, sea beams, scorpion fish, multi-coloured stripey fish, amphorae shards, caves and shipwrecks.
Lotus Spa is a spacious and brand new spa center in Santorini where you can spend endless hours of leisure and rejuvenation.

Enjoy a natural pedicure as you dip your feet into calming water at this Athens spa. Let the exotic little Garra Rufa fish nibble away at the dry skin, leaving your feet feeling relaxed and rejuvenated.
Half day trip to both picturesque town Oia and Fira

Explore the beautiful beaches, aquamarine waters and volcanic caves of Santorini by sea kayak on an 8-hour tour suitable for those with some kayaking experience. Cross the caldera, and see the hot springs, where you can picnic and snorkel.

Enjoy the crystal-clear waters of the Aegean Sea and sail with us along the south coast of Greece in a traditional Greek ship. This tour features stops at many beautiful Greek beaches, opportunities to go snorkeling, and a traditional Greek lunch.
Ride with wind, experience freedom.

strIntroduction: Discover the picturesque mountain village of Myrtia on this half-day tour on Crete. Explore the birthplace of the famous writer Nikos Kazantsakis, visit the wine plantation of the well-known Minos wine, and sample various fine wines.
strTitle: Crete: Half-Day Tour through the Vineyards of Myrtia

strIntroduction: Sail north from Rhodes to discover the stunningly beautiful island of Symi with its impossibly blue waters and delightful Venetian architecture.
Ancient Thera, the city with its nowadays fascinating ruins, was built at a picturesque settlement at the top of a high rocky mountain called ‘’Mesa Vouno’’.

Learn the secrets of Greek cuisine on this 3-hour cooking lesson and dinner experience. Visit one of the oldest and most popular “tavernas” in Athens to learn cooking secrets from your instructor, with easy instructions and plenty of hands-on cooking!0

At one of the most beautiful beaches in Mykonos the wind made us a present. All summer long from May to October the Meltemi blows loyal and faithful with up to 6Bft inside Kalaftis Bay. In the heart of this windy place the Windsurfing Center Mykonos welcomes you. This is the place for everyone who wants to live for their addiction to windsurf.

The island of Mykonos boasts of local people that are very proud of its traditions and that could keep its culture alive through many centuries of lively history. How did the Myconians live and which traditions are being kept until today? Our excursion deals with these subjects.

Join us for a mysterious trip, on a dark winter night. Any time from the onset of autumn darkness until the light nights of spring, we can witness one of nature’s most spectacular displays; the phenomenon which we call the Northern Lights.
strTitle: Northern Lights Night Tour from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Journey across striking landscapes on Snæfellsnes peninsula and experience stunning natural beauty and breathtaking imagery.

橫跨冰島南部的冰山健行之旅，
截然不同的冰島體驗選擇，
穿越農田與瀑布，拜訪最原始的壯麗景致！
擁有冰島最不一樣的深度體驗！
strTitle: 【一生必去】冰島人間仙境：南海岸瀑布冰川健行

strIntroduction: Plunge yourself into the world of the adorable puffin, the most colourful, charismatic and entertaining little seabird north of the equator and star of this boat trip off the Icelandic coast.

All aboard for an invigorating sea angling tour! Apart from introducing you to the world-famous fishing grounds off the coast of Iceland, this excursion will also enable you to feast on your own freshly-caught fish at the end of the day.

Be on the lookout for whales during this 3-hour cruise on Faxafloi Bay in Reykjavik. Cruise along Iceland's west coast to encounter humpback, minke whales, and white-beaked dolphins. Afterward, learn more about whales at the Whale Exhibition Center.
Enjoy awe-inspiring aerial views of Reykjavik and its mountains on this 40-minute shared Iceland helicopter tour.
strTitle: Reykjavik Helicopter Tour: Mt Esja Summit

strIntroduction: 高品質上網分享器，給您在國外網路也能暢通無阻的體驗！取機還機超方便。

Take a trip to the edge of Iceland on a full-day tour from Reykjavik. Travel to Látrabjarg, the westernmost part of Iceland and all of Europe, passing through stunning scenery. At Látrabjarg you will explore the area that is home to many species of birds.

Admire nature’s own spectacular light show on a 2-hour cruise from Reykjavik Harbour, sailing out towards the unknown in search of the Northern Lights. See their brilliant colors flashing across the evening sky, with views of Reykjavík in the background.
strTitle: Northern Lights Viewing Cruise from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Available throughout the year, this speleology tour takes you to unique locations in Iceland’s most spectacular lava tube caves and craters. These beautiful, natural phenomena were created when the surface lava solidified but magma continued to flow in tunnels.
strTitle: Volcanic Veins - Caving in Lava Tube Tour from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Get ready for an Icelandic off-road adventure with this quad bike tour of the twin peaks of Hafrafell and Úlfarsfell mountains. Venture off the beaten path in an ATV to get an up-close perspective of natural attractions like Lake Hafravatn during the 3.5-hour tour. Admire stunning vistas of Reykjavik, the Blue Mountain range and Hellisheiði Power Station from the summits, and feel the thrill of cruising across the rugged wintry wonderland and up and down steep mountain tracks.
strTitle: Twin Peak Quad Bike Adventure from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Find the ultimate relaxation when in Reykjavik on this excursion to the Blue Lagoon. Surrounded by lava fields and snow-capped mountains, the Blue Lagoon is a geothermal spa outside the city where you can bathe in the warm waters, have a water massage or enjoy a spa treatment. With your transportation all arranged, just lie back and relax, before catching your transport back to your hotel in Reykjavik or to Keflavik Airport for your flight home.
strTitle: Blue Lagoon Spa Roundtrip Transport from Reykjavik

strIntroduction: Hike and climb Iceland's Sólheimajökull, one of the most beautiful glaciers in the world. Along with an expert guide, you can explore the deep crevasses and even climb its glassy ice walls with provided safety equipment.
strTitle: Day Trip from Reykjavik: Glacier Hiking and Ice Climbing on Iceland's Sólheimajokull Glacier

strIntroduction: This tour takes you to unique sights of Iceland's most spectacular lava tube caves and craters.
